current_contact.agency: Washington Cnty Coroners OfcArkansas Crime Lab

case_circumstances: This decedent was reportedly one of three individuals who boarded a transit bus in Fayetteville, Arkansas, at a homeless shelter. Bus driver was alerted that decedent was ill and needed to be taken to the hospital. The bus proceeded on its route and the other two individuals got off bus at a stop without decedent. The decedent was found unresponsive in his seat and EMS called. This decedent was in possession of a fraudulent ID.
case_head_hair: Short gray hair with prominent male pattern balding.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: 1 black jacket with gray trim, 1 green long sleeve button down shirt, and 1 pair of denim jeans.
case_footwear: 2 black sandals and 2 white socks with gray trim.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
